content.rendered:

But it is easy now in 2024. You can verify everyone legally. It is 100% online.

Try the Professional Verification Services of Helpers Near Me.

Verify your Driver legally today and save yourself from all the hassle.

Now you can legally verify your Workers/Staff at Helpers Near Me. We follow a 2/3 Step Background Verification Process. OPTIONS – 1) ID Check, which confirms the validity of the govt. ID the individual carries, 2) Court/Criminal Records Check, which scans the court records of the individual at the neighbouring Indian District Courts around his/her present or permanent address, & 3) Address Check, which reports whether the individual stays at the place where one claims to be staying. At HNM, YOU CAN VERIFY your Domestic Workers, School Workers, Restaurant Workers, Office Workers, Factory Workers, Hospital Workers, Store Workers and Logistics Workers like Truck Drivers, Loaders, etc.

Want to hire a good car driver for yourself? Try Helpers Near Me today.

Verification for Maids is easy in 2024. You can do it online.

Looking for online police verification or professional background checks for drivers?

Getting background verification checks done for drivers, maids, cooks, or other workers at your place is as challenging as finding them.

Even though the usual offline choice is available, we all typically look for an online option – an online police verification option or any other professional background check option.

When you get into the available offline option, you often find it quite cumbersome:

  1. First, you must get a Police Verification Form from the local police station or your society’s office. In some cities, you can also access an online police verification form. However, the rest of the steps are still offline.
  2. Second, you fill out the form for the Driver with his full detail
  3. Then you go and submit it to the nearest police station, either yourself or ask the Driver to do so
  4. Sometimes, you even have to be physically present with the Driver at the police station.
  5. And if the relevant documents are pending, you may end up visiting there twice
  6. In the end, after a few days, you get the approved & stamped copy of the Police Verification Form for your Driver

In our busy lifestyle, this exercise becomes so much of a task that we often never get into it.

Most of us end up avoiding it until we can.

The fact is that only about 10% of us go through the whole exercise of due diligence before we hire the Driver, Maid, or other workers at our place.

And the rest of us take a copy of the individual’s ID and rely mostly on their reference.

Think about it:

  • But does an ID copy give you assurance about your Driver’s past credentials?
  • Would the reference who got you the Driver or the Maid take his/her guarantee?
  • Would an ID copy ensure a safe environment for your family at home or while travelling?

The fact is that in today’s time, nobody takes anyone’s guarantee.

No matter how strong a reference you get, the person would never take a guarantee of the Driver he’s referred.

People you know may still recommend a driver or a maid. But you can only be truly assured after legally verifying the person’s credentials.

9 reasons why it is essential to perform background checks/police verification on Drivers, Maids, Cooks, Babysitters or other Domestic Workers before hiring them:

1. Safety of your Home and Family

Your Driver and other domestic workers have direct access to your home, belongings, and family members.

Conducting a background check helps ensure that you are hiring individuals who do not have a history of criminal behaviour, violence, or other activities that could threaten your household’s safety.

2. Ensuring the safety of Children and Elderly at home

If you are hiring a Driver, Maid, Babysitter or Elderly Care attendant to provide care for children, the elderly at home, or individuals with special needs, a background check is crucial.

It helps verify their suitability for the task you are hiring them for.

3. Prevention of Theft and Fraud 

Background checks can help identify workers with a history of theft, fraud, or other dishonest behaviour.

This safeguards your personal belongings, valuables, and financial assets.

4. Trust and Peace of Mind

Knowing that your Driver, Maid, Cook, Babysitter or other domestic worker has undergone a thorough background check can give you peace of mind, allowing you to trust them more easily with your home and family responsibilities.

5. Protection of your Privacy

Your Driver and Domestic Workers often have access to sensitive and private information within your household.

A professional background check helps ensure that you are hiring individuals who can be trusted to maintain confidentiality and respect your privacy.

6. Personal Reputation

The behaviour and conduct of your Driver and Domestic Worker can reflect on your family’s reputation.

Hiring individuals with a positive background can help maintain your family’s standing in the community.

7. Legal Compliance

As you may be aware, In India, there are legal recommendations regarding background checks for domestic workers, especially if they work with vulnerable family members such as children or the elderly.

And if you are staying in a gated community, your building admin would have similar compliances.

Conducting background checks ensures that you comply with applicable rules and regulations.

8. Minimizing Liability

Within your society, you could be liable if your Driver, Maid or other Domestic Worker engages in harmful or illegal activities while under your employ.

Conducting a background check helps mitigate this risk by demonstrating due diligence in your hiring process.

9. Long-Term Relationship

If you are considering hiring a Driver, Maid, Cook or Babysitter for a long-term engagement, a professional background check ensures that you are making a sound investment of time & effort in someone who will contribute positively to your household over time.

It would be incorrect to say that every Driver’s background is stained.

More than 80%-90% of Drivers, Maids, Cooks and other blue-collar workers are genuine people trying to earn a respectful life.

Helpers Near Me connects with many such Drivers, Maids, and other Helpers almost daily.

Largely, a considerable percentage of Domestic & Workplace Helpers are genuine.

They all want to work diligently and earn a respectful living.

However, some want to make some quick money or have hidden motives.

And usually, this small set of people stains the entire workers’ community.

Getting a proper Police Verification or a Professional Background Verification done for the individual ensures a safe environment for the family.

Here’s an initiative from Helpers Near Me that will help you with professional background verification for Drivers, Maids, Cooks, Babysitters, or other Domestic Workers.

The process is as simple as it could get.

This service answers what you have in mind when searching for online police verification for drivers or their professional background verification.

This service lets you verify your Driver or any other worker online and in the most convenient way possible.

Imagine getting a detailed Background Verification Report of the Driver you’ve hired recently or are about to hire.

Here are 3 quick steps to take when you need your Driver’s Background Verification Report.

And all of it can be done directly through your mobile phones.

1st Step: Open the Background Verification Application of Helpers Near Me and Select the verification checks you wish to go for.

2nd Step: Fill in and upload the details of your Driver (Name, Phone, ID number and Address, if you have any).

3rd Step: Make an online payment starting from ₹199. That is all.

You must follow the above-mentioned basic steps to initiate your Verification request for your Driver.

And if all the details are intact, you may get your Driver’s Background Verification Report in 7-10 working days maximum.

You don’t even need to go anywhere to pick up the report.

You get your Driver’s detailed Background Verification report directly in your email.

Helpers Near Me follows a 2/3-Step Verification Process for the Drivers:

1) ID Verification – Your Driver’s ID gets verified through genuine Government sources

2) Criminal/Court Records Verification – In this case, we scan the Criminal/Court Records for the Driver. This check is done through a reliable Government District portal that details every individual’s criminal/court cases.

3) Upon special request, at an additional cost, Helpers Near Me also performs a Physical Address Verification of the individual, which is the third step.

Our partner company’s integration with UIDAI, NSDL, and reliable Government District portals ensures a diligent Background Verification of every individual’s credential that goes through the process.

With this kind of Professional Background Verification Check, you get transparency into the Driver’s Identity, Antecedents, and Character.

This kind of Professional Verification check allows you to make an informed decision on the person you have already hired or are about to hire.

With Helpers Near Me’s new background verification initiative, you can be 100% sure of your driver’s background.

So, the next time you search for online police verification for drivers or professional background checks, try this Helpers Near Me service.

And if you still rely on your Driver’s ID copy and some references, we suggest you verify your Driver, Maid, Nanny, or other workers today!
